summary: A comprehensive test suite that uses Moto to mock AWS services and validates the functionality of the AWS Kinesis Data Firehose client via boto3. It covers creation, deletion, description, and listing of delivery streams, configuration of various destination types (S3, Elasticsearch, HTTP, Redshift, Snowflake), encryption handling, record ingestion (put_record and put_record_batch), and tag management operations.
business_intent: To ensure that the Firehose integration code behaves correctly across a range of scenarios, providing confidence that delivery streams are managed, secured, and utilized as expected, and to prevent regressions in the handling of different destination configurations and operational features.
